sentence: What do you call a cow with no legs ground beef
explanation: refers to ground as in the surface of the earth and ground as in minced meat
first_new_sentence: The ground in this area is soft and easy to dig
second_new_sentence: They served us ground beef for dinner.

sentence: Why did the cook late to thanksgiving dinner? he lost track of thyme
explanation: refers to thyme as the herb used in cooking and time as a measurement of hours and minutes
first_new_sentence: The thyme in the garden is flourishing this season
second_new_sentence: I lost track of time while reading my book.
